customKeycodes.name: L_SNP_INC
customKeycodes.title: Increase left trackball sensitivity when in sniping mode

customKeycodes.name: L_SNP_DEC
customKeycodes.title: Decrease left trackball sensitivity when in sniping mode

customKeycodes.name: L_Snipe
customKeycodes.title: Reduce left trackball sensitivity while held

customKeycodes.name: L_SNP_TOG
customKeycodes.title: Toggle left trackball between normal and sniping mode

customKeycodes.name: L_DragScroll
customKeycodes.title: Make left trackball behave as a scroll wheel while held

customKeycodes.name: L_DragScroll_TOG
customKeycodes.title: Toggle left trackball between normal and drag scroll mode

customKeycodes.name: R_DPI_INC
customKeycodes.title: Increase trackball sensitivity on right hand

customKeycodes.name: R_DPI_DEC
customKeycodes.title: Decrease trackball sensitivity on right hand

customKeycodes.name: R_SNP_INC
customKeycodes.title: Increase right trackball sensitivity when in sniping mode

customKeycodes.name: R_SNP_DEC
customKeycodes.title: Decrease right trackball sensitivity when in sniping mode

customKeycodes.name: R_Snipe
customKeycodes.title: Reduce right trackball sensitivity while held

customKeycodes.name: R_SNP_TOG
customKeycodes.title: Toggle right trackball between normal and sniping mode

customKeycodes.name: R_DragScroll
customKeycodes.title: Make right trackball behave as a scroll wheel while held

customKeycodes.name: R_DragScroll_TOG
customKeycodes.title: Toggle right trackball between normal and drag scroll mode
